package org.apache.isis.core.metamodel.services.grid.fixedcols.applib;

import org.apache.isis.applib.annotation.MemberGroupLayout;

public enum Hint {
    LEFT,
    MIDDLE,
    RIGHT;

<fim_suffix>    public int from(MemberGroupLayout.ColumnSpans columnSpans) {
        if (this == LEFT)
            return columnSpans.getLeft();
        if (this == MIDDLE)
            return columnSpans.getMiddle();
        if (this == RIGHT)
            return columnSpans.getRight();
        throw new IllegalStateException();
    }


}<fim_middle>// function below has no smell
